channel.title: Tabhosts - VPS And Dedicated Servers! [OFFER Currently On]!
channel.description:
Welcome to Tabhosts. We are here to let you know about our great Dedicated Server deals which are currently giving you the chance for 50% off on the first payment of any of our Dedicated Servers. To take full advantage of our offer, please enter the coupon code DEDI50%OFF when available.
Tabhosts currently have an up-time of 188 Days, thus, making it a very reliable host. We also have another offer for you to take full advantage of, which is displayed on our homepage, *
Tabhosts has been reccomended by many of google users because of what we have to offer for such a little price.
Before purchasing any product from our website, please ensure that you have clearly read our Terms of Service.
Thank you.
